basics.label: LICENSED HEALTHCARE COMMUNICATOR
basics.summary: To obtain a stable and growth-oriented position which will allow me to promote the profession of nursing by training and developing current and future nurses.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Licensed Healthcare Communicator / RN - OR / RN Supervisor / Field RN / Billing Supervisor / Staff Nurse/Evening Shift Charge Nurse / RN Case Manager / Staff Nurse
work.summary: A versatile and skilled healthcare professional with experiences ranging from being a licensed healthcare communicator to a supervisor, providing patient education and support, overseeing care tasks, coordinating case management and authorizing procedures. Additionally performed tasks of maintaining a safe and sterile environment for patient in operating room, documentation and activities related to billing and insurance coverage.
